name: Kon-kit Style LoRA
description:
Kon-kit style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Man it was hard to make sfw cover images for this one (as you can probably tell by some of the negative prompts).

Another great style, this author is able to draw very seductive girls. Of course, being primarily a hentai artist, most of the dataset contains nsfw concepts. Images have been generated using this LoRA at 0.6-0.7 weight and AbyssOrangeMix2_nsfw. Trigger is kon-kit.

This is not NSFW per se, it's just a drawing style.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
